summary.span: 命名空間中的型別支援 .NET Framework 裝載環境 (在 ASP.NET 中使用快取功能)。

span.span: The types in the namespace support .NET Framework hosting environments that use the caching features in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別會公開靜態屬性。The base class exposes a static property. 當.NET Framework 的裝載環境啟動個別的應用程式定義域時，它可以將參考設定至屬性。When a .NET Framework hosting environment starts individual application domains, it can set a reference to the property. 這可讓裝載環境提供更佳的整合與快取。This enables the hosting environment to provide better integration with the cache. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、命名空間提供可用來設定裝載環境的介面參考上屬性。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the namespace provides interfaces that a hosting environment can use to set a reference on the property.
